text: 2 . 6 . Immunosuppression . Early data , examining the pathogenesis of graft injury in liver transplant recipients with HCV infection , first reported that methylprednisolone treatment for acute rejection led to a 4 - 100 - fold increase in serum HCV RNA [ 31 ] . Since then , an aggravated course of HCV reinfection after LT and increased resistance to antiviral therapy have been attributed to the application of specific immunosuppressive medication [ 32 , 33 ] . Herein , various immunosuppression strategies have been evaluated for their influence on HCV recurrence .
